cta.title: Sign up
cta.heading: Boost your productivity. Start using our app today.
cta.description: Join companies that are transforming their business with personalized technological solutions. Access professional tools to manage projects, clients, and quotes efficiently.

footer.copyright: Â© {year} imSoft, Inc. All rights reserved.

banner.title: We use cookies
banner.description: We use essential cookies for site functionality and optional cookies to enhance your experience. You can customize your preferences at any time.

preferences.title: Cookie Preferences
preferences.subtitle: Customize which cookies you want to accept
preferences.info: You can change your preferences at any time from the footer of our website.

categories.essentialDesc: Necessary for basic website functionality. Includes authentication, security, and basic preference cookies. Cannot be disabled.
categories.functionalDesc: Allow the site to remember your preferences such as language, dark/light theme, and other personalized settings to enhance your experience.
categories.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how visitors interact with our site by collecting information anonymously. We use this data to improve our services.
categories.marketingDesc: Used to track visitors and display relevant ads. We currently do not use marketing cookies, but this option is available for future campaigns.
